Brief Restoration.name: Brief Restoration
Brief Restoration.description: Choose an object of L bulk in your possession. When your familiar is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it is not destroyed. Instead it assumes a spiritual form and its “consciousness” is placed in an object on your person. For each hour it remains in the object undisturbed, it regains Hit Points equal to your level. It cannot leave this object until it regains all of its Hit Points.

Deathlink.name: Deathlink
Deathlink.description: If your familiar would be reduced to 0 Hit Points by damage, before they are destroyed, as a reaction with the concentrate trait, you gain a number of Hit Points equal to 1d8 times half your level.

Effect: Call-Out.name: Effect: Call-Out
Effect: Call-Out.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.impossible-lands.impossible-lands-feats.B1h1NpkenxI48ylK]{Call-Out}.

Success The target is momentarily put off. They receive a -1 status penalty to Stealth and Will saves and they cannot benefit from cover or the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} condition for 1 round.

Failure The target is left befuddled at the fact they were actually confronted and slow to respond. As success, but the penalty is -2 and the duration is 1 minute.

Effect: Dance Partner (Marker).name: Effect: Dance Partner (Marker)
Effect: Dance Partner (Marker).description:
Granted by @Compendium[impossible-lands.impossible-lands-feats.vMqzNJBRfbAt3URv]{Dance Partner}.

Place this effect on your designated partner.

Effect: Divine Comedy.name: Effect: Divine Comedy
Effect: Divine Comedy.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.impossible-lands.impossible-lands-feats.ELZtz0sZPlpwWl5a]{Divine Comedy}.

Critical Success The target receives a -3 status penalty to your selection against others within your audience for 1 round and then -2 status penalty for 1 minute afterwards.

Success The target receives a -2 status penalty to your choice for 1 for 1 round and then a -1 status penalty for 1 minute afterwards.

Failure The target receives a -1 status penalty to your choice for 1 round.

Effect: Enveloping Armor.name: Effect: Enveloping Armor
Effect: Enveloping Armor.description:
Granted by @Compendium[impossible-lands.impossible-lands-feats.AmoH7PK3SaiNJwjs]{Enveloping Armor}.

Your aura grants your allies a status bonus to saving throws from the spell school your armor is infused with equal to its armor potency bonus. Your armor is no longer Infused and you lose your infused armor benefits.

Effect: Fey Favor.name: Effect: Fey Favor
Effect: Fey Favor.description:
Trigger You attempt a Diplomacy check on a Fey creature and haven't yet rolled

Effect You roll the triggering check twice and take the better result.

Effect: Infectious Antics.name: Effect: Infectious Antics
Effect: Infectious Antics.description:
Granted by @Compendium[impossible-lands.impossible-lands-actions.Ks0c15PShonpvdcI]{Infectious Antics}.

You gain a +1 status bonus to your choice of attack rolls, Will saves, or Charisma-based skill checks until the start of your next turn.

Effect: Quicksteps.name: Effect: Quicksteps
Effect: Quicksteps.description:
Granted by @Compendium[impossible-lands.impossible-lands-feats.kLOlXUEGSTOtUHzy]{Quicksteps}.

You gain a 10-foot status bonus to your Speed and the bonus lasts for a number of rounds equal to the spell level of the required spell.

Effect: Shades of Life (Monarch).name: Effect: Shades of Life (Monarch)
Effect: Shades of Life (Monarch).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.impossible-lands.impossible-lands-spells.Y0YtKRguj6sx1oUi]{Shades of Life}.

Monarch – You grow great green, moth-like wings. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land speed for 1 minute.

Effect: Shades of Life (Unicorn).name: Effect: Shades of Life (Unicorn)
Effect: Shades of Life (Unicorn).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.impossible-lands.impossible-lands-spells.Y0YtKRguj6sx1oUi]{Shades of Life}.

Unicorn – A small, shining horn protrudes from your head while the rest of your body sprouts a thin layer of impossibly soft white fur. During the duration, you can spend 1 Interact action to heal yourself or an adjacent ally for a number of d6 equal to half your level plus your spellcasting ability modifier. The target also gains a +1 status bonus to saves against mental effects for the duration.

Explosive Death.name: Explosive Death
Explosive Death.description: When your familiar is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it explodes as necromantic energy holding it together is released. Adjacent creatures take 1d4 negative damage per 2 levels you possess with a @Check[type:reflex|basic:true] save equal to your spell DC.

Explosive Stench.name: Explosive Stench
Explosive Stench.description: Your familiar’s body contains a terrible concoction of materials. When your familiar is reduced to 0 Hit Points their viscera ruptures into a foul smelling 10-foot burst that lasts 1 minute. A creature entering the area or starting its turn in the area must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude] save against your spell DC or become sickened 1. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Familiar Hug.name: Familiar Hug
Familiar Hug.description: Once per day, you can Command your familiar to spend both its actions to assume a spiritual form and merge its essence to a weapon wielded by you or an ally by touching it. The weapon gains the effects of ghostly weapon spell for 1 minute while it remains merged. While merged, your familiar cannot be targeted or take any actions except to make a single action with the concentrate trait to end the effect and return to its form.

Feast.name: Feast
Feast.description: If adjacent to a deceased creature of at least Small size that died in the past hour, your familiar can spend an Interact to feast upon its flesh to heal itself. This restores an amount of Hit Points equal to your level.

Reverse Rot.name: Reverse Rot
Reverse Rot.description: Once per hour, your familiar can automatically grant you a save against a disease affecting you or an ally with a +2 circumstance bonus to the save. It takes damage equal to your level when it uses this ability.

Screaming Head.name: Screaming Head
Screaming Head.description: Once per hour, you can Command your familiar to spend both its actions to rip off its head and throw it up to 20 feet. Your familiar attempts to Demoralize foes within 10 feet of its head with a modifier equal to your level plus your spellcasting ability modifier. Your familiar can only gain 1 action when you give it Commands until it spends an Interact action to reattach its head.
